releases.title: v0.50.0
releases.description:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v0.50.0 -->

## What's Changed
### Enhancements 🔥
* Continue/abort a conflicted cherry-pick or revert by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4441
* Show todo items for pending cherry-picks and reverts by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4442
* Use "git cherry-pick" for implementing copy/paste of commits by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4443
* Allow reverting a range of commits by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4444
* Section headers for rebase todos and actual commits by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4463
* Focus the main view by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4429
* Auto-forward main branches after fetching by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4493
* Add new command "Move commits to new branch" by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/3876
* Strip the '+' and '-' characters when copying parts of a diff to the clipboard by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4519
* Reduce memory consumption of graph (pipe sets) by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4498
### Fixes 🔧
* Fix truncation of branches when scrolling branches panel to the left by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4483
* Fix nvim-remote commands for fish shell by @SavingFrame in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4506
* Disallow creating custom patches when the diff context size is 0 by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4522
* Remove double space between rebase todo and author columns by @stefanhaller in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4520
### Maintenance ⚙️
* Allow closing issues via github actions by @jesseduffield in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4515
### Docs 📖
* Add Debian installation instructions alongside Ubuntu by @jmkim in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4501
* fix wording of random tip by @dawedawe in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4488

## New Contributors
* @jmkim made their first contribution in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4501
* @SavingFrame made their first contribution in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4506
* @dawedawe made their first contribution in https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/pull/4488

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/compare/v0.49.0...v0.50.0
